message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exclusive opportunity tailored to meet your needs. I believe its value exceeds $15000 to you. Let's start our negotiation. My initial offer is $20000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $4000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make a smart financial decision.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your financial considerations. To better align with your budget while still valuing our product, my counteroffer is $6000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above the budget I had in mind. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $5000. Can we discuss further?

I'm glad you found our product appealing, Bob. To further explore a mutually beneficial arrangement, I propose a counteroffer of $5500. This reflects a compromise considering both our interests. I look forward to your response.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm getting closer to a decision, but I'm still a bit above the budget I had in mind. I'd be willing to go up to $4800. Can we meet at this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I would like to offer a counterproposal at $4900. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our interests. I am hopeful for your acceptance.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting close to a decision, but I'm still trying to be responsible with my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $4700. Can we finalize the deal at this price?

I understand your financial constraints, Bob. To reach a satisfactory conclusion, I propose a counteroffer of $4750. This price reflects a reasonable compromise and I believe it will allow us to finalize the transaction.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $4600. This is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to explore other options.
